Detailed Description

template<int N, class T>
struct thrust::tuple_element< N, T >

This metafunction returns the type of a tuple's Nth element.

Template Parameters:
NThis parameter selects the element of interest.
TA tuple type of interest.
See also:
pair
tuple

Member Typedef Documentation

template<int N, class T >
typedef tuple_element<N-1, Next>::type thrust::tuple_element< N, T >::type

The result of this metafunction is returned in type.
